segment: High Gear Media Privacy Policy

model_analysis.explanation: The segment 'High Gear Media Privacy Policy' is likely a title or introductory part of the privacy policy, which does not provide specific details about data practices or categories. It serves as a general introduction to the document.

segment: Thank you for your interest in this websites services and privacy information. This privacy policy applies to the following websites owned and operated by High Gear Media Inc.: The Car Connection ( www.thecarconnection.com); Motor Authority ( www.motorauthority.com); and Green Car Reports ( www.greencarreports.com) (each a Site and together, the High Gear Media Sites). Because the High Gear Media Sites share a common platform and registration system, the information that you provide on one Site may be used when you visit one of the other Sites listed above.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment provides an introductory statement about the privacy policy, listing the websites it applies to and explaining the shared platform and registration system.

segment: This privacy policy does not apply to information that you choose to publicly post to or display on a Site. Please note that, as provided in our Terms of Service, you grant us a license to all publicly-posted content and it can be syndicated to third-party sites and content partners.

model_analysis.explanation: The policy states that publicly posted content can be syndicated to third-party sites and content partners, indicating sharing with third parties.

segment: What Information Do We Collect?   Information You Provide Directly To Us " You are not required to provide information about yourself when you visit our Sites (other than automatically-collected information, as described below) and many of the features of our Sites can be used without registration. If you do elect to register on a Site, access various content or features, or contact us directly through our Sites, we may ask you for different types of information, including:   Contact information, such as a name, email address, postal address, phone number, facsimile number, and/or mobile number;  A user ID and password;  Other demographic information, such as gender, age, job information, zip code and/or professional interests;  Communication preferences, such as which newsletters you would like to receive  Information posted in community discussions and other interactive online features; and  Correspondence you send to us.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of personal information directly from users when they choose to register or use features on the website, which includes contact information and demographic data, implying explicit collection for basic service features.

segment: Information We Collect Automatically on Our Sites " Our Sites may collect certain information automatically, including your browser type and operating system and your Internet Protocol (IP) address. We compile logs of IP addresses of Site users for administrative and analytical purposes. We do not routinely collect any personally identifiable information through our compilation of IP addresses. However, in cases of suspected abuse or service problems, we may use an IP address in conjunction with other personally identifiable information to enforce our terms of use and/or to protect the Site, its users, or others who may be affected.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the automatic collection of IP addresses and device information for administrative and analytical purposes, indicating implicit collection on the website for service operation and security. It specifies that the information is not routinely identifiable, but may be used with identifiable information in certain cases.

segment: How do your Sites use and share my information?   We use the information we collect about you to:   Fulfill your requests for products, services and information, including to send you electronic newsletters or complete a transaction that you have requested;  Enable you to participate in features such as surveys, polls, sweepstakes and message boards;  Provide you with electronic newsletters, updates, information, special offers and promotional materials on behalf of our Sites and third parties, in accordance with applicable law;  Analyze the use of our Sites and information about visitors to our Sites to understand and improve those Sites and our content offerings, and, in accordance with our sharing policies as stated below, to produce anonymous or aggregated data and statistics that we may share with third parties;  Develop and produce advertising tailored to your interests, as further described herein; and  Prevent potential illegal conduct or to address actual or suspected violations of our terms of use.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the use of collected information to fulfill user requests, enable participation in features, provide newsletters and promotional materials, analyze site usage, develop advertising, and prevent illegal conduct, which falls under service operation and security.

segment: Additionally, we may use information that has been aggregated or otherwise anonymized, so as to not make it personally identifiable to you (Aggregate Data) for various purposes. For example, we may use it to improve our content offerings and services.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the use of aggregated or anonymized data, which is not personally identifiable, for improving content offerings and services. This falls under the category of service operation and security.

segment: We share your information:   With your consent when you request a third party service through our Site;  With authorized third-party service providers who assist us in the operation of our business;  With sponsors and third parties related to a sweepstakes or contest that you elect to participate in and as required by law, such as on a published winners list;  In cases of abusive behavior or suspected violations of our terms of use in order to investigate the violation and to take appropriate action  Where we have a good faith belief that it is required in order to respond to subpoenas, court orders, or other legal process, to prevent fraud or imminent harm, or to establish or exercise our legal rights or defend against legal claims  If one or more of our Sites is sold or transferred to another company, your Personal Information will also be transferred. We will notify you if your information will be subject to a different privacy policy;  We may share Aggregate Data with third parties for various purposes.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes various scenarios where user information is shared with third parties, such as with consent, for business operations, legal requirements, or in the event of a sale or transfer of the site.

segment: Please also note that we may share Aggregate Data with third parties for various purposes. For example, we may disclose Aggregate Data to third parties to help us operate our business and develop content offerings and services and to help these third parties develop their products and service offerings.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment discusses sharing aggregated data with third parties to help operate business and develop services, indicating sharing with unnamed third parties for service operation and security purposes.

segment: Price Quotes " Our Sites allow you to request vehicle price quotes from one or more dealers that you select. When you submit a request for a price quote, you are consenting to have your personally identifiable information shared with one or more of the auto lead companies shown on the Car Quotes Information Page displayed to you when you submit your request. These auto lead companies may share that personally identifiable information with the dealer(s) youve selected and with other third parties who offer goods and services that they determine may be of interest to you. You may review each of these companies privacy policies by clicking on the links shown on the Car Quotes Information Page.

model_analysis.explanation: This segment explains that personally identifiable information is shared with auto lead companies and potentially other third parties, indicating third-party sharing/collection.

segment: How may you communicate with me?   We may send various types of newsletters, updates, and other communications to you as described above under the How do your Sites use and share my information? heading.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes how the company may communicate with users by sending newsletters and updates, indicating collection of information on their website for communication purposes.

segment: As one type of communications we send,using the email address associated with your account, we may send you administrative announcements communicating information about our Sites, your account or content that you have posted to the account. You may not opt out of these messages. If we are required by law to provide you with any notice, such as in the event of a security breach, you consent to receiving notice to the email address you have provided us.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment explains that users cannot opt out of receiving administrative announcements via email, indicating a choice scope related to first-party use where the only option is to not use the service to avoid such communications.

segment: If you sign up to receive any newsletters or updates from us through our Sites, or if you otherwise receive promotional communications from us, you will be able to opt-out of those communications by following the procedures described within the communication itself. You also may contact us to opt-out from promotional communications that we send.

model_analysis.explanation: This segment discusses the user's ability to opt-out of receiving promotional communications, indicating control over first-party use of their contact information.

segment: What are our policies regarding third parties?   This privacy policy does not apply to information collected by advertisers, vendors or other third parties whose content, ads or promotions appear on our Sites but who operate independently. It is advised that readers first check the individual privacy policies of such third parties before providing personal information.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment specifies that third parties collect information on the first party's website/app, but the privacy policy does not cover these activities, indicating third party collection.

segment: Links to third party sites are provided solely as a convenience to our readers. If you use these links, you will leave this site. It is not possible to review all such sites and we have no control over, nor do we take responsibility for, their individual content or privacy policies.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment indicates that links to third-party sites are provided, but the company does not control or take responsibility for these sites, suggesting an action related to third-party interactions categorized as 'Other'.

segment: Advertisers, survey groups and other sites linked to or from our Sites may seek to obtain additional information from users. For example, they may serve cookies, conduct surveys, request personal information or take actions not covered by our privacy policy. This information will not be gathered by or on behalf of our Sites unless clearly authorized and stated in such solicitations. If you choose to do business with vendors on our Sites, you may be asked to provide personal information, including credit and credit card data. Any information you share will be covered only by that partys own privacy policy.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment discusses third parties such as advertisers and survey groups collecting information on the first party's website, indicating third-party collection activities.

segment: If you decide to provide any of these outside parties with credit information and other personal information, you do so entirely at your own risk.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment indicates that credit information and other personal information may be provided to outside parties, which implies sharing with third parties. The user does so at their own risk, suggesting the company does not assume responsibility for this action.

segment: What About Cookies?   Cookies are small pieces of information that may be served to you while visiting a Web site, and which are then stored on your computers hard drive.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes cookies, which are small pieces of information stored on a user's computer, thus categorizing it under 'Cookies and tracking elements'.

segment: It is possible you will be served cookies by us, by our advertisers or by the companies that help us deliver advertising on our Sites. Cookies help us and advertisers identify users on our Sites and on other sites. Please see below under

model_analysis.explanation: The segment indicates that cookies are used on the company's sites to identify users, which falls under first-party collection on the website.

segment: What are your Sites advertising practices to see how these cookies are used.    Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but they also offer a user the ability to block them. Doing so may prevent you from using some of the features of our Sites. Instructions for blocking cookies can be found in your browser help tab. You can also learn more about how cookies and other technologies are used to target advertisements to your browser at www.networkadvertising.org/understanding-online-advertising. You also have choices regarding participating companies collection and use of certain information collected through these technologies, as described below.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment discusses user choices regarding the use of cookies for advertising purposes, highlighting the ability to block cookies via browser controls.

segment: What are your Sites advertising practices?   We, our advertisers, and our third party advertising companies may use information (not including your name, address, email address or telephone number) about your interaction with advertising on our Sites and your visits to this and other Web sites, including information collected through cookies, in order to provide advertisements on our Sites and other sites about goods and services that may be of interest to you. If you would like more information about this practice and to know your choices about not having this information used by participating companies, please click here: www.networkadvertising.org/choices.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes sharing user interaction data with advertisers and third-party advertising companies for the purpose of targeted advertising.

segment: You can also learn more about specific companies we allow to place cookies on our Sites and their policies regarding use of that data and advertising targeting here.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment indicates that specific companies are allowed to place cookies on the first party's sites, which involves third-party data collection on the first party's website.

segment: How about childrens privacy?   We are committed to protecting the privacy needs of children and we encourage parents and guardians to take an active role in their childrens online activities. Our Sites are not intended for under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children under the age of 13 and we do not target the Sites to children under the age of 13.

model_analysis.explanation: This segment is focused on the privacy of children, specifying that the sites are not intended for children under 13 and that information is not knowingly collected from them, highlighting compliance with children's privacy protection standards.

segment: What are the Sites security practices?   We have implemented certain measures to help protect your user Information from loss, misuse, or unauthorized access or disclosure. Unfortunately, however, no data transmission over the Internet can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. As a result, while we strive to protect your user Information, we cannot guarantee its security.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes general security practices to protect user information but does not specify any particular security measures.

segment: How will changes to this policy be communicated?   We may update this Policy from time to time. If we make any material change to the way in which we treat your User Information, we will inform you of such change by posting an updated privacy policy at this location or through email notification, at our option. Any updated version of this privacy policy will be effective as soon as it is posted on our Sites.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment indicates that users will be informed of material changes to the policy through an updated privacy policy posted on the site or via email, suggesting a privacy relevant change with general notice and no explicit user choice.

segment: How may users change or terminate their account?   You have the right to terminate your account or update any Personal Information collected by our Sites by contacting us at feedback@highgearmedia.com . If you terminate your account, your Personal Information will be removed from our system, subject to our right to retain any data necessary to investigate any violation of terms of use or alleged harmful or illegal activity.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment explains that users can terminate their account, which involves the removal of their personal information from the system, indicating a full account deletion.

segment: For some features, such as newsletter mailings, specified procedures to update your personal information or opt out of the service may be found in the emails you receive.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment mentions that users can opt out of the newsletter service through specified procedures in the emails, indicating an opt-out link is provided.

segment: Your California Privacy Rights   It is High Gear Medias policy to share personal information only with the users informed consent unless otherwise specified in this privacy policy. With your consent, from time-to-time, High Gear Media may provide its business partners with contact details for direct marketing purposes of relevant services, products, and programs. California Civil Code Section 1798.83, also known as the Shine The Light law, permits our users who are California residents to request and obtain from us once a year, free of charge, information about the personal information (if any) we disclosed to third parties for direct marketing purposes in the preceding calendar year. If applicable, this information would include a list of the categories of personal information that was shared and the names and addresses of all third parties with which we shared information in the immediately preceding calendar year. If you are a California resident and would like to make such a request, please let us know using this contact us form . You may also let us know at this number that you no longer wish your information to be shared.

model_analysis.explanation: This segment outlines the rights of California residents under the California Civil Code Section 1798.83, allowing them to request information about how their personal information is shared for direct marketing purposes.

segment: How we respond to Do Not Track Disclosures .   Some browsers have a do not track feature that lets you tell websites that you do not want to have your online activities tracked. Because these features are not yet uniform, we are not currently set up to respond to do not track signals. Our information and disclosure practices will continue to apply as described in this privacy policy regardless of any Do Not Track signals that are sent by certain browsers.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment states that the company does not respond to Do Not Track signals, indicating that such signals are not honored.

segment: How may users communicate with you?   You can contact us for additional information by visiting this page:   http://www.highgearmedia.com/contact/

model_analysis.explanation: The segment provides information on how users can contact the company for additional information, which falls under privacy contact information.

segment: You may also correspond by standard post at:   Privacy Policy   High Gear Media   830 Menlo Ave, Suite 201   Menlo Park, CA 94025

model_analysis.explanation: The segment provides a physical mailing address for correspondence related to privacy matters, indicating it is privacy contact information.

segment: Contact Us   For further information on this or any other topics email us using our Contact page.

model_analysis.explanation: This segment provides information on how users can contact the company for further information, which falls under privacy contact information.
